attributes.action: Add LGBTQ+ history to the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: I am part of the LGBTQ+ community and i and many others feel left out. We have to listen to things we don’t take part in and we need to show pride
attributes.background: I would like to include LGBTQ+ history and their sexual education into the curriculum because it’s needed as the world is changing as we know it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553574
